EmailTemplate.name: SRT reminder Directors
EmailTemplate.subject: **REMINDER** School Readiness Talk 10 August
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
** Just a reminder that this event is on next Wednesday evening **
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}
Pre-School Directors, staff and parents of {!Account.Name} are invited to come along to a talk by education experts about the recent research regarding school readiness
Presentations by: Mrs Rhonda Robson
Head of Junior School, St Andrews Cathedral School, Master of Education (Counselling Psychology), University Lecturer in Child Development, Educational Psychology and Post Graduate qualifications in Gifted and Talented Education
Mrs Mary Zahn
Head of Primary Support Education and Curriculum Coordinator at Arndell College
Key discussion topics include:
• Early start vs. holding back • Readiness indicators • Preparation for Kindergarten transition
6.00pm – 7.00pm Wednesday, 31 July 2013 St Andrew’s Cathedral School
Junior School, Level 7, St Andrew’s House
Enter via the school’s foyer, Ground Floor, St Andrew's House,Sydney Square (opposite the main doors of St Andrew’s Cathedral)
Bookings are essential
Please RSVP to Robyn Pedley rpedley@sacs.nsw.edu.au
or 9286 9552
There will be a supervised creche on the evening for your convenience. Discounted parking is available in Wilson’s carpark, St Andrew’s House, Kent Street (discounted parking validation available on the evening for parking before 6.00pm)
We look forward to welcoming you on the evening.
Robyn Pedley Enrolments Administrative Assistant
St Andrew's Cathedral School
Sydney Square, Sydney NSW 2000, Australia
